name: Accounts Generator Bot
description: Python based bot to generate accounts.

ACCOUNTS.description: Raw Link to your accounts, read the ReadMe for more info.

CHANNEL.description: Channel link/@username for force join, leave for disabling force join. The bot must be admin in that channel.

START.description: Start message. Use {mention} to mention the other user.

ACC_NAME.description: Name of the account the bot generates

REDIS_URI.description: Redis Database URL, get it from redislabs.com. Read ReadMe for more info.

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Redis Database Password, get it from redislabs.com. Read ReadMe for more info.
